title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: Welcome RAINER - new best friend R. RAINER provides explanations error messages, outputs yielding intended results suggestions improvements script based LLM. , RAINER sends current state work R GPT model using possibility access GPT-4o GitHub.

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: r_error(): use function get explanation error message means, occured correct issue r_activate(): use function automatically trigger r_error() always error message occurs r_explain(): use function output (e.g. table) yield result intended without throwing error message r_improve(): use function get suggestions improve code

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: RAINER currently available CRAN (yet). install package, use remotes::install_github("soda-lmu/rainer") (importantly, remotes package needs installed first, existing already, install.packages("remotes")).

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: installing RAINER loading package first time, four questions pop console need answered using package. answers saved local folder read attaching RAINER future avoid providing information every time load package. information : Acceptance data protection regulations GitHub, provides access LLM (see information) answer whether ’re allowed log part queries order develop RAINER (see information) GitHub token access LLM (see information) prefered language responses (German English) want change information saved file, use function rainer:::dataprot(), rainer:::logging(), rainer:::github_token(), rainer:::language().

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: GitHub token can access LLMs free charge (see information: https://docs.github.com/en/github-models). Therefore, need personal GitHub token, can create following steps: 1. Open settings GitHub (click profile upper right corner select ‘settings’) 2. Scroll choose ‘developer settings’ menu left 3. Select ‘Personal access tokens’ 4. Select ‘Tokens (classic)’ 5. Click ‘create new token’ upper right corner 6. can choose now scopes (scopes necessary accessing LLM) expiration date. expiration, access (RAINER) work anymore new token required. can provide new token rainer:::github_token(). 7. Remember directly copy code creation since accessed afterwards!

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: access LLM provided GitHub. Hence, usage RAINER’s functions interaction user GitHub (see GitHub’s data protection regulations: https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-general-privacy-statement). following data R environment included query: currently opened document (e.g. script, R-markdown-document, …) structure loaded datasets (data sent, just variable names) name type loaded entities (e.g. variables, functions, …) loaded packages last error message

title: R Assistant IN Error Resolution
text: developed RAINER first place improve start R students without little prior programming experiences. understand students struggle enhance package including prompts, like save part query using RAINER. logging contains currently opened document (e.g. script, R-markdown-document, …) error message connected query. information saved anonymously without possibility tracing back sent query. Acceptance logging voluntary package work without accepting , . acceptance can withdrawn time function rainer:::logging() choosing . stored queries used academic context published passed parties. case questions, may contact XXX (xxx@xxx.de). Thank much!
